description: Explore and organize files and folders across your workspace. Read, write, move, and delete items while inspecting detailed metadata. Find anything fast with name, glob, regex, and in-file text search.

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size for read/write operations in MB

max_search_depth.description: Maximum recursion depth for directory searches

capabilities.name: list_directories
capabilities.description: List all subdirectories in a given path with metadata (name, size, item count, timestamps)

capabilities.name: create_directory
capabilities.description: Create a new directory with optional parent directory creation

capabilities.name: delete_directory
capabilities.description: Delete a directory, optionally with all its contents (recursive delete)

capabilities.name: move_directory
capabilities.description: Move or rename a directory from source to destination path

capabilities.name: get_directory_metadata
capabilities.description: Get detailed metadata about a directory (size, item counts, timestamps, permissions)

capabilities.name: list_files
capabilities.description: List all files in a directory with optional glob pattern filtering

capabilities.name: read_file
capabilities.description: Read file content with chunking support (returns text or base64 for binary files)

capabilities.name: write_file
capabilities.description: Write or overwrite a file (supports text and base64-encoded binary content). REQUIRES USER CONFIRMATION before execution if file exists.

capabilities.name: append_file
capabilities.description: Append text content to an existing file

capabilities.name: delete_file
capabilities.description: Delete a file permanently. REQUIRES USER CONFIRMATION before execution. This is a destructive operation.

capabilities.name: move_file
capabilities.description: Move or rename a file from source to destination path. REQUIRES USER CONFIRMATION before execution.

capabilities.name: get_file_metadata
capabilities.description: Get detailed metadata about a file (size, MIME type, timestamps, permissions)

capabilities.name: search_by_name
capabilities.description: Search for files and directories by exact name match

capabilities.name: search_by_glob
capabilities.description: Search using glob patterns (*.txt, **/*.py) with wildcard support

capabilities.name: search_by_filename_regex
capabilities.description: Search for files and directories using regex pattern on filenames

capabilities.name: search_by_content_text
capabilities.description: Search for text files containing specific text with context preview

capabilities.name: search_by_content_regex
capabilities.description: Search for text files using regex pattern on content with context preview
